text:
Hi all-

I was wondering if there something in Julia for making automatic twitter retweet/like bot? Like python has a few libraries.

elements.text:
Hi all-

I was wondering if there something in Julia for making automatic twitter retweet/like bot? Like python has a few libraries.

text: there is <https://github.com/randyzwitch/Twitter.jl> to access Twitter API, but I don't know what you can do exactly

elements.text: there is
to access Twitter API, but I don't know what you can do exactly

text: Yeah I used Twitter.jl to access twitter before! Works well. Sometimes you need to use their documentation along with Twitter API documentation too

elements.text: Yeah I used Twitter.jl to access twitter before! Works well. Sometimes you need to use their documentation along with Twitter API documentation too

text: Looks good but seems like it is for scraping data from twitter.  Can I retweet and like tweets using this too? And is there a feature in it to do that automatically?

elements.text: Looks good but seems like it is for scraping data from twitter.  Can I retweet and like tweets using this too? And is there a feature in it to do that automatically?

text: Here's a simple DeleteMyTweets script I made

elements.text: Here's a simple DeleteMyTweets script I made
https://github.com/kimlaberinto/SimpleDeleteMyTweets.jl/blob/main/deletetweets.jl

text: Automatically retweet stuff? Not really. You'll have to know the ID of the tweet you want to retweet and then pass it through to Twitter.jl

elements.text: Automatically retweet stuff? Not really. You'll have to know the ID of the tweet you want to retweet and then pass it through to Twitter.jl

text: But you can post tweets and like tweets too

elements.text: But you can post tweets and like tweets too

text: But yes in general, retweeting, posting, and liking are all possible with Twitter.jl

elements.text: But yes in general, retweeting, posting, and liking are all possible with Twitter.jl

text: So it is not possible to retweet tweets from a particular hashtag using it?

elements.text: So it is not possible to retweet tweets from a particular hashtag using it?
https://www.github.com/randyzwitch/Twitter.jl/tree/master/src%2FTwitter.jl

text: Word of caution <@U01A0S07875>,setting up a bot to auto retweet hashtags requires... a lot of adversarial thinking.

elements.text: Word of caution
,setting up a bot to auto retweet hashtags requires... a lot of adversarial thinking.

>post_destroy_single_tweet_i post_status_update,
post_status_retweet_id,

text: The retweet bots for Julia pick up retweeting a porn actress called Julia every now and then and that's not likely what you want.

elements.text: The retweet bots for Julia pick up retweeting a porn actress called Julia every now and then and that's not likely what you want.

text: oh yeah, I just noticed that. It looks like a very nice package. It will be fun to play with it

elements.text: oh yeah, I just noticed that. It looks like a very nice package. It will be fun to play with it

text: It's caused Randy Zwitch a few headaches over the years :sweat_smile:

elements.text: It's caused Randy Zwitch a few headaches over the years

text: thanks <@U6QGE7S86> but I am not planning anything big, just a small area am focusing. Only retweeting from a 'particular' hashtag :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: thanks
but I am not planning anything big, just a small area am focusing. Only retweeting from a 'particular' hashtag
Godspeed then!

text: Here's a fun little Julia twitter bot I found in the wild recently. Posts random gravitational N-body animations <https://twitter.com/ThreeBodyBot|https://twitter.com/ThreeBodyBot> Source code in description

attachments.title: Random Three-Body Problem (@ThreeBodyBot) | Twitter
attachments.text: The latest Tweets from Random Three-Body Problem (@ThreeBodyBot). Random initial conditions (DM to request!): M between 0.1 & 150 solar masses | Speed less than 10 km/s | Positions in a 50x50 AU box | by @CaptainKirkLong. Trisolaris
